parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description:
The action mode of the rule. Valid values:

*   **1**: alerts
*   **2**: block

parameters.name: RuleType
parameters.description:
The type of the rule. Valid values:

*   **0**: user-defined rule
*   **1**: built-in rule

parameters.name: WhiteImages
parameters.description: The images that are added to the whitelist.
